      public void moveStudToDining(PawnColor pawnColor) throws NoPawnPresentException, TooManyPawnsPresent
      Method to move a student from the Waiting Room(entrance) to the DiningRoom.
      Parameters:
      pawnColor - color of the respective student.
      Throws:
      NoPawnPresentException
      TooManyPawnsPresent

    • moveStudToIsland

      public void moveStudToIsland(PawnColor pawnColor, Island island) throws NoPawnPresentException
      Method to move a student from the Waiting Room(entrance) to an Island.
      Parameters:
      pawnColor - pawnColor color of the respective student.
      island - island where the player wants to move his student.
      Throws:
      NoPawnPresentException

    • addProfessor

      public void addProfessor(PawnColor pawnColor) throws TooManyPawnsPresent
      Method to add a professor to the SchoolBoard.
      Parameters:
      pawnColor - pawnColor of the respective professor.
      Throws:
      TooManyPawnsPresent - if there is already the professor of that color.

    • removeProfessor

      public void removeProfessor(PawnColor pawnColor) throws NoPawnPresentException
      Method to remove a professor from the SchoolBoard.
      Parameters:
      pawnColor - pawnColor of the respective professor.
      Throws:
      NoPawnPresentException - if there is not the professor of that color.

    • updateNumberOfTowers

      public void updateNumberOfTowers(int num) throws TooManyTowersException, NoTowersException
      Method to add (or remove) towers from the SchoolBoard.
      Parameters:
      num - the number of towers to add (or remove if num is negative).
      Throws:
      TooManyTowersException
      NoTowersException

      Parameters:
      pawnColor - pawnColor of the student.
      Throws:
      TooManyPawnsPresent

    • removeStudents

      public int removeStudents(PawnColor chosen)
      Method to remove a maximum of 3 students of a certain color from the SchoolBoard. It's an effect of the ColorToStudentBag character card.
      Parameters:
      chosen - is the pawnColor to remove.
      Returns:
      the students effectively removed.
